result.eng: You will have to deal with the question.
result.ga: Beidh ort déileáil leis an cheist
result.orig: Beidh ort déileáil leis an cheist
result.html: Beidh ort déileáil leis an cheistYou will have to deal with the question.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ ort déileáil leis an ċeistYou will have to deal with the question.

result.eng: We deal with enquiries from the public.
result.ga: Bíonn muid ag plé le fiosrúcháin ón phobal
result.orig: Bíonn muid ag plé le fiosrúcháin ón phobal
result.html: Bíonn muid ag plé le fiosrúcháin ón phobalWe deal with enquiries from the public.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn muid ag plé le fiosrúċáin ón ṗobalWe deal with enquiries from the public.

result.eng: They helped a great deal of people.
result.ga: Chuidigh siad le lear mór daoine
result.orig: Chuidigh siad le lear mór daoine
result.html: Chuidigh siad le lear mór daoineThey helped a great deal of people.
result.ponchtml: Ċuidiġ siad le lear mór daoineThey helped a great deal of people.

result.eng: How will the government deal with the problem of unemployment?
result.ga: Conas a dhéileálfaidh an rialtas le fadhb na dífhostaíochta
result.orig: Conas a dhéileálfaidh an rialtas le fadhb na dífhostaíochta
result.html: Conas a dhéileálfaidh an rialtas le fadhb na dífhostaíochtaHow will the government deal with the problem of unemployment?
result.ponchtml: Conas a ḋéileálfaiḋ an rialtas le faḋb na díḟostaíoċtaHow will the government deal with the problem of unemployment?

result.eng: How will they deal with domestic waste?
result.ga: Conas a dhéileálfaidh siad le dramhaíl teaghlaigh
result.orig: Conas a dhéileálfaidh siad le dramhaíl teaghlaigh
result.html: Conas a dhéileálfaidh siad le dramhaíl teaghlaighHow will they deal with domestic waste?
result.ponchtml: Conas a ḋéileálfaiḋ siad le draṁaíl teaġlaiġHow will they deal with domestic waste?

result.eng: They found a great deal of explosives.
result.ga: Fuair siad lear mór d'ábhar pléascach
result.orig: Fuair siad lear mór d'ábhar pléascach
result.html: Fuair siad lear mór d'ábhar pléascachThey found a great deal of explosives.
result.ponchtml: Fuair siad lear mór d'áḃar pléascaċThey found a great deal of explosives.

result.eng: The team will deal with every business in Irish only.
result.ga: I nGaeilge amháin a bheidh an fhoireann ag plé le gach gnó
result.orig: I nGaeilge amháin a bheidh an fhoireann ag plé le gach gnó
result.html: I nGaeilge amháin a bheidh an fhoireann ag plé le gach gnóThe team will deal with every business in Irish only.
result.ponchtml: I nGaeilge aṁáin a ḃeiḋ an ḟoireann ag plé le gaċ gnóThe team will deal with every business in Irish only.

result.eng: I hope I won't have to deal with those people ever again.
result.ga: Tá súil agam nach mbeidh orm plé leis na daoine sin go deo arís
result.orig: Tá súil agam nach mbeidh orm plé leis na daoine sin go deo arís
result.html: Tá súil agam nach mbeidh orm plé leis na daoine sin go deo arísI hope I won't have to deal with those people ever again.
result.ponchtml: Tá súil agam naċ mbeiḋ orm plé leis na daoine sin go deo arísI hope I won't have to deal with those people ever again.

result.html: Bíodh ina mhargadh mar sinOK, it's a deal!
result.ponchtml: Bíoḋ ina ṁargaḋ mar sinOK, it's a deal!
